verses.name: 2 Timothy 1:1
verses.text: Paul, an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God, according to the promise of life which is in Christ Jesus,

verses.name: 2 Timothy 1:2
verses.text: To Timothy, my dearly beloved son: Grace, mercy, and peace, from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Lord.

verses.name: 2 Timothy 1:3
verses.text: I thank God, whom I serve from my forefathers with pure conscience, that without ceasing I have remembrance of thee in my prayers night and day;

verses.name: 2 Timothy 1:4
verses.text: Greatly desiring to see thee, being mindful of thy tears, that I may be filled with joy;
